column4: hey guys. i want to easily switch between running the nvidia proprietary drivers and nouveau. is there a switch i can put in at boot time to toggle between the two, or is it always going to involve something awkward?
I think its more complex then that. since the nvidia drivers blacklist the nouveau drivers. and the 2 can conflict otherwise
thanks, i was hoping it wouldn't be something like that. :(
i suppose i'll have to set up an extra partition or something. thanks anyway :)
